item.title: Uses
item.description: This page describes software I use. Other people also do such lists. I don’t know why. Browsers Safari - my main browser. It’s fast and respects privacy Firefox - amazing open source browser. I would use it as my main browser if it had a level of synchronisation between Mac and iPhone that Safari has Productivity Things 3 - my task management system. All my personal, hobby, study and work tasks live there.
